summary: A custom test case class that extends unittest.TestCase, adding utilities for fully resolved project‑relative path access, flexible creation of temporary directories that are automatically cleaned up, and provision of a test‑specific environment with an appropriate PYTHONPATH.
business_intent: Enable test developers to write concise, reliable tests by abstracting away repetitive setup tasks such as locating files within the repository, managing isolated temporary workspaces, and configuring the execution environment for external tools.
